subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: General Manager Brian Cashman said Tanaka, the Yankees’ ace, would most likely be lost for at least a month with tendinitis in his right wrist and a slightly strained forearm.
snippet: General Manager Brian Cashman said Tanaka, the Yankees’ ace, would most likely be lost for at least a month with tendinitis in his right wrist and a slightly strained forearm.
